com.jayway.maven.plugins.android.common

Class AaptCommandBuilder.AaptPackageCommandBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jayway.maven.plugins.android.common.AaptCommandBuilder
      • com.jayway.maven.plugins.android.common.AaptCommandBuilder.AaptPackageCommandBuilder
  • Enclosing class:
    AaptCommandBuilder

    public static final class AaptCommandBuilder.AaptPackageCommandBuilder
extends AaptCommandBuilder
    Class that responsible for building appt commands for packaging resources

      • makeResourcesNonConstant

        public AaptCommandBuilder.AaptPackageCommandBuilder makeResourcesNonConstant()
        Make the resources ID non constant. This is required to make an R java class that does not contain the final value but is used to make reusable compiled libraries that need to access resources.
        Returns:
        current instance of AaptCommandBuilder.AaptPackageCommandBuilder

      • makeResourcesNonConstant

        public AaptCommandBuilder.AaptPackageCommandBuilder makeResourcesNonConstant(boolean make)
        Make the resources ID non constant. This is required to make an R java class that does not contain the final value but is used to make reusable compiled libraries that need to access resources.
        Parameters:
        make - if true make resources ID non constant, otherwise ignore
        Returns:
        current instance of AaptCommandBuilder.AaptPackageCommandBuilder

      • addConfigurations

        public AaptCommandBuilder.AaptPackageCommandBuilder addConfigurations(String configurations)
        Specify which configurations to include. The default is all configurations. The value of the parameter should be a comma separated list of configuration values. Locales should be specified as either a language or language-region pair.

        Some examples:

        • en
        • port,en
        • port,land,en_US

        If you put the special locale, zz_ZZ on the list, it will perform pseudolocalization on the default locale, modifying all of the strings so you can look for strings that missed the internationalization process.

        For example:

        • port,land,zz_ZZ
        Parameters:
        configurations - configuration to include in form of String
        Returns:
        current instance of AaptCommandBuilder

      • addExtraArguments

        public AaptCommandBuilder.AaptPackageCommandBuilder addExtraArguments(String[] extraArguments)
        Adds some additional aapt arguments that are not represented as separate parameters android-maven-plugin configuration.
        Parameters:
        extraArguments - Array of extra arguments to pass to Aapt.
        Returns:
        current instance of AaptCommandBuilder

        Returns:

      • renameManifestPackage

        public AaptCommandBuilder.AaptPackageCommandBuilder renameManifestPackage(String manifestPackage)
        Rewrite the manifest so that its package name is the package name given here.
        Relative class names (for example .Foo) will be changed to absolute names with the old package so that the code does not need to change.
        Parameters:
        manifestPackage - new manifest package to apply
        Returns:
        current instance of AaptCommandBuilder.AaptPackageCommandBuilder

      • renameInstrumentationTargetPackage

        public AaptCommandBuilder.AaptPackageCommandBuilder renameInstrumentationTargetPackage(String instrumentationPackage)
        Rewrite the manifest so that all of its instrumentation components target the given package.
        Useful when used in conjunction with --rename-manifest-package to fix tests against a package that has been renamed.
        Parameters:
        instrumentationPackage - new instrumentation target package to apply
        Returns:
        current instance of AaptCommandBuilder.AaptPackageCommandBuilder

      • setDebugMode

        public AaptCommandBuilder.AaptPackageCommandBuilder setDebugMode(boolean isDebugMode)
        Inserts android:debuggable="true" into the application node of the manifest, making the application debuggable even on production devices.
        Returns:
        current instance of AaptCommandBuilder.AaptPackageCommandBuilder
